title: COZY, WELL-LOCATED, 1 BD/1 BA, 600+ SQ FT CONDO
posting_body: COZY, WELL-LOCATED, 1 BD/1 BA, 600+ SQ FT CONDO
COZY, WELL-LOCATED, 1 BD/1 BA, 600+ SQ FT CONDO ~
***LOVELY ON-SITE SWIMMING POOL, CLUB HOUSE, AND HOT TUB**
COZY, WELL-LOCATED, 1 BD/1 BA, 600+ SQ FT CONDO UNIT, LOCATED IN A WELL-ESTABLISHED & MAINTAINED CONDO COMPLEX, WITH INCREDIBLE VIEWS OF THE SMOKIES, JUST MERE MINS.
TO DOWNTOWN GATLINBURG, THE GREAT SMOKY MOUNTAINS NATIONAL PARK & MUCH MORE.
HIGH CHALET IS PART OF A WELL-MAINTAINED CONDO COMPLEX, WHICH BOASTS A LOVELY ON-SITE SWIMMING POOL, CLUB HOUSE, AND HOT TUB.
